verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_6: Indeed, the human being is ungrateful to his Lord.
verse.verse_7: And he bears witness to that.
verse.verse_8: And he is fierce in his love of wealth.
verse.verse_9: Does he not know? When the contents of the graves are scattered around.
verse.verse_10: And the contents of the hearts are obtained.
verse.verse_11: Their Lord, on that Day, is fully informed of them.
